main: ^Jose Rizal or José Protasio Rizal Mercado y Alonso Realonda was a Filipino nationalist, writer, and polymath active at the end of the Spanish colonial period of the Philippines.

c-0: ^He is from Calamba, Laguna and ophthalmologist by profession.
^Jose Rizal is considered the national hero or pambansang bayani of the Philippines. He is also the author of the two famous novels, Noli Me Tángere (1887) and El filibusterismo (1891).
^Rizal was executed by the Spanish colonial government for the crime of rebellion after the Philippine Revolution broke out.
